I may help you, it took me about 5 hours to install it:

1. You need PowerIso to unpack it, download and unpack.  
2. You need the voodoo2a.dll, if this torrent doesn't include it, download another one. 
3. Burn all unpacked things on a normal CD in the normal mode CD(ISO).
4. Install the cracks, but I think they dont work. 
5. Install the game off the CD. 
6. Copy the folder "Movies" (that you unpacked at the beginning) to the Data folder of your installdirecton which is normally C:\Programme\Electronic Arts\Need For Speed High Stakes\Data
7. Copy the folder "Audio" (that you unpacked at the beginning, too) to the Data folder of your installdirecton which is normally C:\Programme\Electronic Arts\Need For Speed High Stakes\Data\Audio
8. Run the game and have fun!

With NFS 4 high stakes I have yet to find a NOcd patch that works. The game still checks for the game cd or produces a error requiring a patch restart. The reason HFSHS is a pain in the ass is because the start up exe is encrypted so when you start the game it searches the game cd for the encryption key first without this the game will not start. The cracked exes are suppose to already carry the encryption key for starting the game but for some reason they don't work. Plus I have also found that the game cd must be in the D drive which is usually the default letter for the cdrom drive or the game just keeps asking for the game cd...This game for it's age is really good but it's copy protection is a apsolute nightmare....If anyone has found a way to run this without the cd then it would be nice to hear, my nfshs cd's getting a bit worn nowadays...
